privacy.intro_text: Dog Trainer App ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.data_text: We collect information you provide directly: account details (email, password), dog profiles (name, breed, age, photos), training progress, health records, and walk tracking data. We also collect device information and usage analytics to improve the app.
privacy.usage_text: We use your data to: provide and improve our services, personalize your training experience, sync data across devices, send notifications you've requested, and analyze app performance.
privacy.storage_text: Your data is stored securely using Supabase cloud infrastructure with encryption at rest and in transit. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information.
privacy.rights_text: You can access, update, or delete your personal data at any time through the app settings. You may also request a complete data export or account deletion by contacting us.
privacy.contact_text: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at support@dogtrainerapp.com

terms.acceptance_text: By downloading, installing, or using Dog Trainer App, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the app.
terms.use_text: You may use the app for personal, non-commercial purposes only. You agree not to misuse the app, attempt to access it through unauthorized means, or use it for any illegal purposes.
terms.account_text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.content_text: You retain ownership of content you create (dog profiles, photos, notes). By using the app, you grant us a license to store and display this content to provide our services.
terms.disclaimer_text: The app provides general dog training guidance and is not a substitute for professional veterinary or behavioral advice. We are not liable for any outcomes resulting from following app recommendations.
terms.changes_text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

onboarding.slide1_description: Your personal companion for training your furry best friend. Start building a stronger bond today!
onboarding.slide2_description: Follow our structured lessons from beginner to advanced. Track your progress and celebrate milestones.
onboarding.slide3_description: Log walks with GPS tracking, monitor distance, and record important events along the way.
onboarding.slide4_description: Stay motivated with badges and streaks. Watch your training journey unfold!
